item.title: Context-Based 3D Haptic Grid
item.description: The Context-Based 3D Haptic Grid extends the visual and haptic feedback of the real-world to help users do precise mid-air 3D manipulations. Our system creates 3D grids that surround each object (virtual and real) in the scene to help users see the object’s transformation. It also provides haptic feedback to helps users do precise manipulations without constraining their actions.
